entry.title: Can't Stop the Feeling (or the Gay Panic)
entry.summary:
Author: fluffpuff

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 2,215Chapters: 1/8Kudos: 7

Summary: It starts with a karaoke night. Or maybe it doesn’t.Over the course of one week, a series of completely unrelated (read: wildly dramatic, suspiciously timed) events unfold across the lives of several very queer, very emotionally unstable heroes. There’s tension. There’s pining. There’s pop music. And absolutely no one is communicating.Each chapter features:✨ One ship🎶 One pop song💥 One emotional crisis💋 One bad decision (minimum)By the time the week is over, someone’s cried to Taylor Swift, someone’s made out to Kylie Minogue, someone’s broken a window, and at least three people have had a gay awakening. Maybe the universe is trying to tell them something. Or maybe the super group chat is cursed.

entry.title: Identities.
entry.summary:
Author: Feathered_Stag

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 6,095Chapters: 4/?Kudos: 281

Summary: All of the Justice League members know each other's identities, aside from Batman- but no one knows that Superman knows Batman's identity. Because of their hidden personal lives and the secret relationship between Batman and Superman, some drama ensues. It's pretty hilarious to Batman, though from Superman's point of view, it's stressful how much the other League members are misunderstanding the situation... The Batfam is also pretty involved in this... not to mention they ALSO don't know about Bruce's and Clark's relationship. There will be some smut.Also my bad if there are any continuity errors ✋

entry.title: The Man Behind It All - A SuperBat Story
entry.summary:
Author: azulyra_moon

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 14,308Chapters: 1/?Kudos: 3

Summary: The Wayne family was predominantly successful in many ways; being strong, healthy, and all absolutely handsome from a supposedly upstanding background with no means for mistakes, weakness, or forgiveness. “Having flaws or petty arguments puts a target on your back. Fix it, keep quiet, or die,” said their very blunt but importantly, hypocritical father. So, masks stayed on, even within the Wayne Manor.To the protégé’s in the Wayne family— the Kryptonian, Man of Steel, Boy-Scout, Big Blue, or simply ‘Supes’ was known an associate of the Justice League that their father tolerated. Little do they know it is all complicated than that behind closed doors with Bruce’s relationship with the strongest man on earth. Yet, two fights occur, and someone died. In the end, will love fix all?Easy intro: After a rough introduction and even failing mending relationship between World’s Finest, a member of the Wayne family passes away. Clark Kent, now having a wavering heart of gold, feels a inclination to help hand to the family despite the never-ending rocky road relationship between him and with the Dark Knight, also known as Bruce Wayne, the playboy multi-billionaire, AKA his miscommunicated ex-fling once upon a time.

entry.title: The Buttered Cat Paradox
entry.summary:
Author: writersagainstwritersblock

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 51,948Chapters: 20/?Kudos: 654

Summary: “No comment.”“You don’t know what I was going to ask,” Clark said with a hint of a smile. “Maybe I just wanted to congratulate you on catching the Film Freak.”Bruce gave him a flat look.“Or maybe I think I can help.”“With a case of vandalism?”Clark stepped in front of him. “It’s not vandalism and you know it, detective.”“And what makes you say that?”“If it were vandalism it would be something a lot more juvenile. To the point. It wouldn’t claim there were seventeen missing kids. That’s public outcry.”“Is that so?”“That and I tried to do a story on the growing number of homeless children last month and I got shut down. According to the last count, the numbers have been decreasing, but there’s been no change in policies, no extra funding to CPS, or shelters, or even an increase in the number of inmates in the juvenile detention center. So where are they going?” Detective Bruce Wayne may have the highest solve rate in Gotham, but if he wants to solve this case, he’ll need the help of an elusive street kid, and while Dick Grayson always lands on his feet, he usually lands himself right into trouble.

entry.title: Parenting Justice
entry.summary:
Author: Yuri_Osakawa

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 19,134Chapters: 6/10Kudos: 62

Summary: In one world, Johnathan and Martha Kent found a baby in a spaceship.In this world, they found a baby alongside two adults.In this world, someone else became the Dark Knight of Gotham. A loving father that survived what would’ve been a tragic accident in another world.In this world, someone else became the Wonder Woman. An immortal queen, and a mother.In this world, a father gained access to the Speed Force instead of his son.In this world, another test pilot found a dying alien and gained the Green Lantern ring.In this world, a queen rules the oceans.Because parenting justice is much tougher than delivering it.

Summary: Gotham's youngest prince, Damian Wayne, has built a thriving career and a carefully crafted image in the fashion industry. But beneath it all, he's been drowning in silence ever since Jon Kent drifted away. Until he meets Leon Devereaux-Burciaga, a bold designer who pulls him into an unexpected marriage proposal.
